metadata.title: CVE-2017-12098 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the addfilter functionality of the rails_admin rails gem version 1.2.0. Aspecially crafted URL can cause an XSS flaw resulting in an attacker beingable to execute arbitrary javascript on the victim's browser. An attackercan phish an authenticated user to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-admin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
